name: Magic Bug
description:
Scuttle around, help other bugs, and solve the magic mystery! This demo features:
  • 13+ puzzles
  • 4 interconnected hub worlds with lots of buggy friends to make
  • 10+ tracks of original bug music
  • and plenty of secrets to discover

*This has been a huge personal project of mine, and is my first public game release. I expect there to be plenty of unwelcome bugs, so please don't hesitate to reach out if you encounter an issue*
